title: "Vaudevilles et chansons", [18th Century].
description: Binding: Contemporary French blue morocco, gilt with the arms of Michel Begon on front and back.
preferredCitation: Vaudevilles et Chansons. James Marshall and Marie-Louise Osborn Collection, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University.
provenanceUncontrolled: For information on the source of acquisition, consult the appropriate curator.
abstract: Containing a collection of anonymous French love songs and vaudevilles, with an alphabetical index at the back
